Control Name: CA-3 (1) UNCLASSIFIED NATIONAL SECURITY SYSTEM CONNECTIONS
Control Statement: The organization prohibits the direct connection of an [Assignment: organization-defined unclassified, national security system] to an external network without the use of [Assignment: organization-defined boundary protection device].
